title: One Piece Episodes 464-468: GAAARP!!!! YOUR FAMILY IS MESSING THINGS UP AGAIN!
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Podcast discussion covering One Piece episodes 464-468, including analysis of Little Oars Jr.'s charge at Marineford and Luffy's arrival at the battle.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through episode 468 of the Marineford Arc

title: One Piece – Marineford Arc (Episodes 457 – 491) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Marineford Arc covering episodes 457-491, describing it as a showdown with the most teased-as-powerful characters finally unleashing a fraction of their power in a big war.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Marineford Arc

title: 464: A Descendant of the Beast! Little Oars Jr. Full Speed Ahead!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: Blog post analyzing episode 464, noting how Oda 'is able to introduce a new character and make you fall for them within the space of one episode' before 'mercilessly kills them off.' Discusses the emotional impact of Ace's simple act of kindness with the kasa.

title: One Piece – 464
author: Random Curiosity
description: Episode review praising the episode, noting 'Oars Jr. is such a badass' and that 'for such a simple reason as a hat, Oars Jr. will go to the far ends of the earth to save a friend.' Also discusses animation quality and speculation about Doflamingo's powers.

title: One Piece Episode 464
author: FanVerse Community
description: Forum discussion where members praised the episode with comments like 'It was directed very nicely, and it was bloody. Animation and art was great. 5/5' and 'They actually made Oars more badass than he was in the manga' calling it 'the most action packed and bloodiest episode in a long time. Anime gets an A+ on this one.'

title: One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Marineford Arc (According To IMDb)
author: CBR (Comic Book Resources)
description: Article ranking the top 10 episodes of the Marineford arc based on IMDb ratings, noting the arc 'spanned 33 episodes and ran from episode 457 to 489'.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Marineford Arc

title: Watch One Piece Reaction - Marineford - Episode 462-464
author: Unknown
description: Reaction video covering One Piece Marineford episodes 462-464.
